actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for special consideration for purposes of veterans' benefits of certain cases of loss or loss of use of paired extremities by a veteran.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to allow for special consideration (resulting in the payment of increased veterans' benefits) of certain cases of the loss or the loss of the use of paired extremities by a veteran.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for special consideration for purposes of veterans' benefits of certain cases of loss or loss of use of paired extremities by a veteran.
